alert.note: Alert for Butte; Central Black Hills; Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Oglala Lakota; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 8:11PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WESTERN BUTTE...SOUTHWESTERN MEADE...CUSTER...LAWRENCE...NORTHWESTERN OGLALA LAKOTA...FALL RIVER...SOUTHWESTERN PENNINGTON...NORTHEASTERN CAMPBELL... NORTHEASTERN WESTON AND CROOK COUNTIES THROUGH 900 PM MDT... At 810 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Biddle to 2 miles south of Galena to 4 miles south of Oelrichs. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Spearfish, Sturgis, Deadwood, Johnson Siding, Nemo, Keystone, Oral, Buffalo Gap, Hisega, and Beulah around 815 PM MDT. Rapid City, Summerset, Whitewood, Piedmont, Fairburn, Tilford, Fort Meade, and Bear Country around 820 PM MDT. This includes... Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 1 and 71. Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 162 and 207. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
